Radwan Khatib

About

I am a 18 year old student studying at Hanze University of Applied Sciences. I am interested in Software Engineering and Artifical Intelligance. The assignment asked to show ourselves rather than tell and I thought what better than to code my own website with the knowledge that I have aswell as some new things I recently picked up. I have always had a fondness for computers and electronics in general. I started with scratch and eventually worked my up to higher level languages.
